name: White Bean and Roasted Garlic Dip
description: This smooth and creamy dip is loaded with flavour â€“ perfect for dipping or topping crostinis.

ingredients.name: Roasted Garlic Aioli Mix or Roasted Garlic Bulbs
3 Onion Dip Mix or Toasted Oninion
olive oil
ingredients.additionalInstruction: plus extra for garnish, if desired

preparation: Combine Roasted Garlic Aioli Mix, water and oil in a measuring cup. Let stand for 5 minutes.
In a food processor, combine next 3 ingredients, including oil mixture, and blend until smooth. Season to taste with Sea Salt and Black Pepper.
Spoon into a serving dish and drizzle with additional olive oil, if desired.
tips: This is a great dish to take to a potluck: spoon into a short, wide-mouth canning jar, drizzle with olive oil and garnish with a couple of olives. Simply unscrew the cap and serve.
Serve with crackers, vegetables or bread sticks.
